description:
Zack came out to do a scene with another model, who basically didn't show up.
So I have a hot and horny guy sitting here doing nothing. What to do?
We needed some images for "possible" inclusion in a magazine (if that happens I will be sure to let everyone know!) so we spent some leisurely time doing photos. It sure was nice taking time to do images and getting creative again.
Anyway, the upshot is, he was still horny after having his dick up for a couple hours, and suggested we do a solo. He had showed me his self-suck during the photo session, so I was eager to get that on film. Well actually, more like self-lick, but let's not split hairs. We also got out a dildo just to make things more interesting.
This video was a dream to edit, and is basically uncut. I had to make a few cuts to take out my clumsiness, but otherwise this is a Real time video.
This IS a hot solo. What do you know? A dude pummeling himself with a dildo AND getting had from it. You literally can see his dick go up and up and UP as the scene goes on. I was basically just a fly on the wall as he went to town.
Even cooler is watching the intensity as he works it up inside of him, forcing himself to cum AND getting a self-facial out of it!
Now, wouldn't it be nice to have someone at the other end of that dildo? (And some of you know what I mean when I gave a 24 hour sneak peek of that video- Coming this Friday!)
